

```{r}
fx <- function(x){
  return(exp((-x**2)/2)*((sin(2*x))**2))
}

chx <- function(x, c){
  mean <- 0
  variance <- 1
  #scalar c * normal with mean and var
  return(c*(dnorm(x, mean, variance)))
  }

```

```{r}
x <- seq(-5,5,0.1)


y <- fx(x)
plot.new
plot(x, y, type = 'l')

#add the normal distribution to the plot
lines(x, y_normal(x, 2.5), col = 'red')
```
